text: Marian Franciszek Jaworski (, 21 August 1926 – 5 September 2020) was a Ukrainian-born Polish Cardinal Priest. He was Archbishop of Lviv of the Latins in the Roman Catholic Church from 1991 until 2008. He was born in Lviv, Ukraine. Jaworski died on 5 September 2020 in Krakow, aged 94. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Biography at catholic-pages.com Category:1926 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Polish cardinals Category:People from Kraków Category:People from Lviv
title: Marian Jaworski
